tool_description: An API that has all live tv stations in Kenya and uganda **NOTE for educational purposes only**
name: LIVE TV API
title: LIVE TV API

api_list.name: /tv/:id
/tv
api_list.description: Returns the entire data for tv endpoint (e.g name, streamUrls, description,...)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-tv-api1.p.rapidapi.com/tv"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-tv-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-tv-api1.p.rapidapi.com/tv"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-tv-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
